content: Yes, movies like Black Panther and Crazy Rich Asians have been hugely successful and have had a significant impact on representation in media. They have proven that diverse stories can be commercially successful and have paved the way for more diverse representation in Hollywood and beyond. It's definitely exciting to see what the future holds in terms of diverse representation in media, and hopefully, more and more movies and TV shows will follow in their footsteps. Overall, it's important to continue to push for diversity and representation in media, as it can have a powerful impact on society and help to promote greater understanding and acceptance of different cultures and perspectives.
